title: Best of The Herd: 05/07/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/07/2019
description:
Colin thinks the Warriors should feel good even after losing game 4 to Houston because even after being outplayed most of the game they still had a chance to send it to OT in the final seconds.  He warns fans rooting for this dynasty to end and explains why they won’t like the alternative.  Plus, FS1 NBA Analyst Ric Bucher tells Colin that most of the blame for the Celtics disappointing season needs to be put on the shoulders of Brad Stevens.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
